co.cask.coopr.layout
Class NodeLayout

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.coopr.layout.NodeLayout

public class NodeLayout
extends Object

Defines the layout of a node, which is a hardware type, an image type, and a set of services.

getImageTypeName

Returns:
Name of the image type used on the node.

getServiceNames

public SortedSet<String> getServiceNames()
Get the names of services on the node sorted in their natural order. Used by comparators to consistently choose the same node layout when solving for a cluster layout.

Returns:
Sorted set of names of services on the node.

satisfiesConstraints

public boolean satisfiesConstraints(Constraints constraints,
                                    Set<String> clusterServices)
Determine if this is a valid node layout some constraints and the set of all services that are also on the cluster.

Parameters:
constraints - Constraints to use for checking validity.
clusterServices - Services on the cluster with this node layout.
Returns:
True if it satisfies all constraints, false if not.

satisfiesServiceConstraints

public boolean satisfiesServiceConstraints(Map<String,ServiceConstraint> serviceConstraints)
Determine if this is a valid node layout given the service constraints.

Parameters:
serviceConstraints - Service constraints to use for checking validity.
Returns:
True if it satisfies all service constraints, false if not.

fromNode

public static NodeLayout fromNode(Node node)
Return the node layout of a given Node.

Parameters:
node - Node to derive the node layout from.
Returns:
Node layout of the node.

Create a new NodeLayout by adding a service to the given NodeLayout.

Parameters:
